name: Dino Runner (Mohammad Sadain Syed)
description:
It is an endless runner where a baby Dino it trying to survive the Big Bang disaster. The game is made in unity.

Controls

  • Touch Screen To move LEFT and RIGHT
  • Release Finger to Make the Dino Jump 

Please note that the assets and the art is used in the game are found in the internet will soon post the links from where i got it from the internet.
